page.title: 10Children's Leisure, Bridgham
page.content:
When it is hot, we swim in the river. We go to the playing field, where there are swings, apparatus and goal posts. We make camps round the edge of the field, or in the woods. Sometimes we cycle down to Harling on our bikes to buy some sweets.
We often have friends over for the day or weekend, because there are not a lot of children our age in the village. Sometimes we get together with other girls and boys and bike somewhere, or make a camp. We like climbing trees. Some days we watch football matches on the playing field. When the weather is nice we go on picnics, or roller skate around Risley Close.
(Jessica aged 12 and Lucy aged 10)
